current_headlines.headline: Hamas spokesman Hazem Qassem also responds to the Cabinet's decisions regarding the lands in the West Bank: The extreme right-wing government seeks to expand the genocide war and eliminate Palestinian existence on Palestinian lands. The recent decisions of the Cabinet emphasize the colonialist nature of the occupation government that seeks to swallow Palestinian lands and expel their original residents. This aggressive policy constitutes a real existential danger to the Palestinian people and their rights.
current_headlines.keywords: Hamas, West Bank, genocide, Palestinian, lands, occupation, government, decisions, colonialist, aggressive, policy, danger, existence

current_headlines.headline: Discovery of smuggled weapons and military ammunition cargo on the Kurdistan border. Commander of the Kurdistan Province Border Guard: Through their intelligence work, our forces were able to discover and confiscate 42 firearms, 729 rounds of military ammunition, and 7 handheld radio devices smuggled in the border city of Sarvabad. One smuggler was arrested in this operation.
current_headlines.keywords: smuggled, weapons, military, ammunition, Kurdistan, border, firearms, rounds, radio, devices, operation, arrested, intelligence

current_headlines.headline: Update: Another American transport aircraft of the Lockheed C-5 type (the largest transport aircraft of its kind in the US arsenal) is now making its way to the Middle East, and there is a report about five American transport aircraft that are making their way to Azerbaijan, the neighbor of Iran.
current_headlines.keywords: American, transport, aircraft, Lockheed, C-5, Middle East, report, five, Azerbaijan, Iran, neighbor, making way, largest

history_headlines.headline: The victory of Sanae Takaichi, Prime Minister of Japan, is turning out to be even greater: her party gained two-thirds (310) of the seats in parliament even without additional parties. Together with another coalition party, Takaichi's coalition gained 341 seats out of 465 possible. A huge and unprecedented victory. ## Foreign Minister Gideon Sa'ar hurried to congratulate Takaichi on her great victory. ## Takaichi presented conservative positions, a tough approach towards China and a warm and prominent connection to President Trump - this paid off for her at the polls. [To comment on the article click here]
history_headlines.keywords: victory, Prime Minister, Japan, Sanae Takaichi, coalition, seats, parliament, Foreign Minister, Gideon Sa'ar, conservative, China, Trump, election

history_headlines.headline: Hamas spokesman Hazem Qassem also responds to the cabinet decisions regarding the lands in the West Bank: The extreme right-wing government seeks to expand the genocide war and eliminate the Palestinian existence on the Palestinian lands. The recent decisions of the cabinet emphasize the colonialist nature of the occupation government that seeks to swallow the Palestinian lands and expel their original residents. This aggressive policy constitutes a real existential danger to the Palestinian people and their rights. [One response]
history_headlines.keywords: Hamas, spokesman, Hazem Qassem, cabinet, decisions, lands, West Bank, government, genocide, Palestinian, existence, colonialist, occupation, aggressive, policy, danger

history_headlines.headline: Turkish experts: The Iranians have been deceiving the West for 30 years with the 'watch the tightrope walker' strategy, everyone was focused on the nuclear program, but Iran in silence upgraded its missile and drone arsenal to the level and capability of Russia, now with tens of thousands of missiles including Khorramshahr4, it leaves any American aircraft carrier defenseless and has plunged Israel into a scenario of terror...
history_headlines.keywords: Turkish experts, Iran, deceiving, West, strategy, nuclear program, missile, drone, arsenal, Russia, Khorramshahr4, aircraft carrier, Israel, terror

history_headlines.headline: The President of Somalia: Israel has reached an agreement with Somaliland on three axes! Hassan Sheikh Mahmoud, the President of Somalia, announced: There are three important informational matters that must be stated, Israel has reached an agreement with Somaliland on three axes; the transfer of Palestinians to Somalia, the establishment of a base in Somaliland, and the signing of the Abraham Accords by Somaliland. These three axes are the points of agreement between Israel and the separatist group Somaliland. The President of Somalia added: The question arises as to why Israel should have a base in Somalia. There is no place to defend Israel in Somalia, and what is observed is that Israel is preparing or positioning to attack another place.
history_headlines.keywords: President, Somalia, Israel, agreement, Somaliland, axes, Palestinians, base, Abraham Accords, separatist, defend, attack

history_headlines.headline: Yosef Haddad on the new sign in Tehran: This threat is like a declaration of war... We did not manage to finish the job in June when the Iranian regime was already defeated in the fighting and our planes were traveling in the skies of Iran, but in the next campaign we have no choice but to deliver, together with the USA, heavy crushing blows and assist the Iranian people to bring an end to the terror regime and ensure that the next time a sign is hung in this square in Hebrew, it will say: 'Thank you Israel from the free Iranian people'!
history_headlines.keywords: Yosef Haddad, sign, Tehran, threat, declaration of war, Iranian regime, defeated, fighting, planes, skies, campaign, USA, blows, Iranian people, terror regime
